description:
Kyosuke and his friends are invited to visit his grandparents, which causes constant problems for Kyosuke as he tries to hide their non-stop use of the power from everyone.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Roots Panic Fushigi no Sato no Madoka
Roots Panic! Madoka in the Mysterious Homeland
ルーツパニック不思議の里のまどか
